name: Split-Second Samurai
description:
Victory lies in a single moment of clarity.  Use your samurai skills to read the heart of battle and execute deft swordplay, or die trying.

You have a short period to enter movement and attacks with WASD and spacebar, then execute them to see if you succeed. 

Controls:
WASD to input a directional move + navigate menu
SPACE select + attack
F to undo the last move entered.  
ESCAPE to quit.
P for level skip.

Made by:
David Nishball (Code/Design) 
Luke Davenport (Code/Graphics)  @midnaut
